current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To authorize the acquisition of core battlefield land at
		  Champion Hill, Port Gibson, and Raymond for addition to Vicksburg National
		  Military Park.

committee-name.#text:
Committee on Energy and Natural
			 Resources

cosponsor.#tail:
) introduced the following
			 bill; which was read twice and referred to the

action-instruction.#text:
Omit the part struck through and insert the part
			 printed in italic

Champion Hill, Port Gibson, and
			 Raymond Battlefields Addition Act

for the

text.#text: On the acquisition of land by the

the acquired land
			 shall be added to Vicksburg National Military Park;

the boundary of
			 the Vicksburg National Military Park shall be adjusted to reflect the
			 acquisition of the land; and

the acquired land
			 shall be administered as part of the Vicksburg National Military Park in
			 accordance with applicable laws (including regulations).

There are authorized to be appropriated such sums
			 as are necessary to carry out this Act
            .
